short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save loading time in slow internet connections by removing all images from the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you have a slow internet connection while traveling abroad or just with your regular ISP ? Save loading time in slow internet connections by removing all images from the page using this nifty extension.
